column_description: Ad group ID
Time the record was updated.
Advertiser ID
The Ad group's campaign ID.
IDs of the action categories (behaviors) that you want to target.
The number of days of the time period to include action from.
Ad group name. Character limit is 512 and cannot contain emoji.
Age groups you want to target. This is the newest version of the field `age`, which was renamed after the Tiktok Ads v1.3 API release.
Minimum Android version.
App download link
The Application id of the promoted app
App name.
App type.
A list of audience IDs.
Audience Type
CPC, CPM bidding, oCPM learning bidding
Bidding Strategy
Bid method.
Ad budget. Returns 0.0 when Campaign Budget Optimization (budget_optimize_switch) is on.
Budget mode. This field will be ignored when Campaign Budget Optimization (budget_optimize_switch) is enabled.
Carriers that you want to target.
Ad group category.
Click monitoring URL.
Device connection types that you want to target. Default; unlimited.
oCPM conversion bid
Video playback duration, required if optimize_goal is VIDEO_VIEW.  Allowed values; SIX_SECONDS (video playback 6s), TWO_SECONDS (video playback 2s)
Creative delivery mode.

Ad delivery period, the default is always and the format is 48 * 7 character string, represented by 0 or 1. > That is, with half an hour as the minimum granularity, a day (24 hours) is divided by the minimum granularity(30 mins) from Monday to Sunday. Resulting in a 48*7 format.0 represents not to be delivered, 1 represents delivery. no transmission, full transmission 0, full transmission 1 all represent full time delivery
Bidding strategy for in-app events.
Deep bid
Deep conversion event.
Display name of ad group.
Inventory filtering (Unsafe videos will not be displayed).
A list of audience ID to be excluded.
Conversion event for the ad group. It is required when the promoted object is an app with tracking urls, or when pixel_id is specified.

Fallback Type. If the audience do not have the app installed, you can have them fall back to install the app, or to view a specific web page. Not applicable for Deferred Deeplink. Allowed values; APP_INSTALL, WEBSITE, UNSET. If website is chosen, you need to specify the url via landing_page_url field.

frequency, together with frequency_schedule, controls how often people see your ad (only available for REACH ads).  For example, frequency = 2 frequency_schedule = 3 means "show ads no more than twice every 3 day".
frequency, together with frequency, controls how often people see your ad (only available for REACH ads).
Gender that you want to target.
Display monitoring URL.
Interest classification. If the interest is specified, users that do not meet interest target will be excluded during delivery.
Minimum iOS version.
Whether to allow comments on your ads on TikTok, Vigo, Helo.
Whether the promoted content is HFSS foods (foods that are high in fat, salt, or sugar).
Whether the campaign is a new structure.
Keywords used.
Landing page URL.
Codes of the languages that you want to target.
IDs of the locations that you want to target.
The specific location where you want your audience to go if they have your app installed.
The open URL type.
Device operating systems that you want to target.
Operation status.
Optimization goal.

You can choose between PACING_MODE_SMOOTH and PACING_MODE_FAST. For PACING_MODE_SMOOTH, the budget is allocated evenly within the scheduled time.  PACING_MODE_FAST would consume budget and produce results as soon as possible.
Package name.
Pangle app block list ID.
Pixel ID. Only application for landing pages.
The apps where you want to deliver your ads.
Placement type.
Avatar URL.
Ad delivery end time (UTC+0). Format should be YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS
Ad delivery start time (UTC+0). Format should be YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS
The schedule type, which can be either SCHEDULE_START_END or SCHEDULE_FROM_NOW.
Whether to skip the learning stage.
conversion bid statistic type
Ad group status
Number of video actions.
Whether users can download your video ads on TikTok(cannot be updated once created).
